tool_description: Analyzes temporal trends in ratings, sentiment, and review volume to identify patterns, seasonality, and emerging issues over time.

time_series_data_source.description: Source identifier for time-stamped review and rating data

analysis_period.description: Time period for trend analysis: last_30_days, last_90_days, last_year, or custom

trend_metrics.description: Metrics to analyze for trends: rating, sentiment, volume, response_time

detect_anomalies.description: Whether to detect unusual spikes or drops in metrics

seasonality_analysis.description: Whether to analyze seasonal patterns in the data

error_messages: Invalid data source: time_series_data_source not found or lacks timestamp information.
Insufficient time range: Not enough historical data available for the specified analysis_period.
Invalid trend metrics: Use metrics from [rating, sentiment, volume, response_time].
Invalid analysis period: Use one of [last_30_days, last_90_days, last_year, custom].
Anomaly detection failed: Unable to establish baseline patterns for anomaly detection.
usage: Provide time-stamped data source and configure analysis parameters. The tool identifies trends, patterns, and anomalies in customer feedback over time.

trend_direction.description: Overall trend direction: improving, declining, stable, or mixed

trend_strength.description: Strength of detected trends on scale from 0 to 1

anomalies_detected.description: Timestamps of detected anomalies in the data

trend_summary.description: Summary of trend analysis results and key temporal insights
